data.name: GRID 2 - Demolition Derby Pack
data.detailed_description: Push GRID 2’s damage engine to its limits as the iconic Demolition Derby game mode from GRID returns to GRID 2 in this free download. Receive the classic Jupiter Eagleray Mk5 and smash your way to the front on two routes at the Detroit Demolition Derby Stadium in single-player, split-screen and online!
data.about_the_game: Push GRID 2’s damage engine to its limits as the iconic Demolition Derby game mode from GRID returns to GRID 2 in this free download. Receive the classic Jupiter Eagleray Mk5 and smash your way to the front on two routes at the Detroit Demolition Derby Stadium in single-player, split-screen and online!
data.short_description: Push GRID 2’s damage engine to its limits as the iconic Demolition Derby game mode from GRID returns to GRID 2 in this free download. Receive the classic Jupiter Eagleray Mk5 and smash your way to the front on two routes at the Detroit Demolition Derby Stadium in single-player, split-screen and online!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian*, German*, Japanese*, Polish*, French*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Процессор: ntel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 5400+
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Intel HD Graphics 3000 / AMD HD2600 / NVIDIA Geforce 8600
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 15 GB
  • Звуковая карта: Direct X compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows Vista 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 bit
  • Процессор: Intel Core i7/AMD Bulldozer
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Intel Graphics 5200 / AMD HD6000 Series / Nvidia GTX500 Series minimum 1GB RAM
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 15 GB
  • Звуковая карта: Direct X compatible soundcard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: 10.9.4
  • Процессор: 2Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 256MB VRAM*
  • Место на диске: 11 GB
  • Дополнительно: *The following graphics cards are not supported: ATI X1xxx series, ATI HD2xxx series, Intel GMA series, Intel HD3000, NVIDIA 7xxx series, NVIDIA 8xxx series, NVIDIA 9xxx series, NVIDIA 3xx series and NVIDIA 1xx series.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: 10.9.5
  • Процессор: 2.4Ghz
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 1GB*
  • Место на диске: 11 GB
